sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO product(prodnum, name, kind, price, content, image, regdate) values(SEQ_product_prodnum.nextval, #name#, #kind#, #price#, #content#, #image#, #regdate#)
sqlMap.select:
SELECT b.* FROM( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM(
SELECT prodnum, name, kind, price, content, image, TO_CHAR(regDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')as regDate FROM product WHERE kind = #kind# ORDER BY prodnum )a ) b
WHERE rn >= #startIndex# AND rn <= #endIndex#
SELECT prodnum, name, kind, price, content, image, regdate FROM product WHERE prodnum=#prodnum#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE product SET name = #name#, kind = #kind#, price = #price#, content = #content#, image = #image#, regdate = #regdate# WHERE prodnum = #prodnum#
